name: Ashlea Thompson
text: The pizza was amazing of the original pan crust pepperoni lovers and the stuffed crust meat lovers pizza and the cheese sticks were so yummy.

name: Ryan Thrush
text: The food was good and the service was decent. I'm not to happy with the route Pizza Hut had taken to nickel and dime you to death when ordering pizza. They have definitely lost their edge.

text: Ordered online from the Wellington, KS Pizza Hut this weekend.  Thought I was ordering a double order of cheese sticks off of the $5 menu (along with several other things).  Got home with my order - it was a single order.  Called the store ‚Ä¶More

text: I used to work at a pizza hut and subsequently i ate there a lot. i always really liked the food, but the pizza is sometimes a bit too greasy (you get 2x pepperoni if you order just pepperoni) and most everything outside the $5 lineup deal ‚Ä¶More

text: Was in Wellington and wanted pizza so we stopped at Pizza Hut. Food took over an hour and all we got was a large pizza. The server never came and checked on us. Wasn't told about a long wait or anything very frustrating and unpleasant could have at least brought us some breadsticks or at least talked to us
